subject: TestSuite - Order of test execution
msgSnippet: Hi all, I know that I shouldn t write tests that depend on other tests etc., but I would still like to know for sure... When I run a JUnit test suite
messageBody:
Hi all,

I know that I shouldn't write tests that depend on other tests etc.,
but I would still like to know for sure...

When I run a JUnit test suite ("regular", not Active), are the tests
run in the order in which they were added to the suite?

E.g., if my test suite is created as follows:

public static Test suite(){

TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
suite.addTest(new TestCaseTest("testNumberOne"));
suite.addTest(new TestCaseTest("testNumberTwo"));
suite.addTest(new TestCaseTest("testA"));
return suite;
}

Can I be sure that when I run the test suite (e.g. using the
junit.textui.TestRunner), the test are executed in the following
order?

testNumberOne
testNumberTwo
testA

My testing indicates this, but I obviously can not know this for sure
from simple testing.

--
Regards,

John
